medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours prior, initially as lower abdominal pain that migrated to the right lower quadrant, associated with nausea and vomiting (non-bilious, non-bloody) at least 5 times. No diarrhea, melena, or blood noted. No fevers or chills. Patient has never experienced this pain before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Remote history of non-active tuberculosis; previous surgery for undescended testicle as a child.
